name: Speed Test - Test Internet Speed and WiFi Speed
description: Speed Test - Test Internet Speed and WiFi Speed helps you test Internet Speed and WiFi Speed on Android.  Speed Test - Test Internet Speed and WiFi Speed makes it easy to test your internet and WiFi speed and Speed Test results are presented in a user-friendly way.  Speed Test - Test Internet Speed and WiFi Speed is a simple internet speed meter.  Speed Test - Test Internet Speed and WiFi Speed will help you test internet speed of many mobile networks. you can easily get the information about your internet speed you need.   Speed Test - Test Internet Speed and WiFi Speed Features :  Test and check Internet speed and WiFi Speed.  Real-time network speed.  Test speed of Download, Upload and Ping.  Check internet speed.  Save the past results of Internet speed test automatically.  View History
